Issue.summary: Record Barebones Transaction Information in Remote DB
Issue.description: So we can monitor the performance metrics of the Barebones network for performance regression, we need to record the transaction metrics in a DB. PTE should publish the results when done. We can use a DB in the IBM cloud. Results should be published in a format that can be consumed by Grafana to create time series chart to show the trend over the last `x` number of days.
